segments.text: Bob , put on your shoes , your feet are really smelly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But don't forget you are in a cafe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never mind , the odour of my feet will quicken their eating speed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I simply can't bear your barbaric behavior .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don â€™ t pretend you are a good God .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should feel shameful for your behavior .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never experienced such a kind of feeling .
segments.speaker: S2
